definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Occurrence liver of second liver patient is sclerotic , can be ascites still treated?
sentences.chinese: 乙肝患者出现肝硬化，腹水还能治疗好吗？

sentences.english: Shifting dullness and a fluid wave are more difficult to elicit and require more ascites.
sentences.chinese: 移动性浊音和流体波更难引出而且需要更大量的腹水。

sentences.english: During the follow-up period, no aneurysms and upper digestive track bleeding recurred.
sentences.chinese: 随访期间无动脉瘤复发或上消化道出血，腹水消失。

sentences.english: Shrinkage of the spleen and absorption of ascites were observed after operation.
sentences.chinese: 术后患者肝脾缩小，腹水吸收。

sentences.english: Electron microscope was used to observe H22 cells 12 days after peritoneal injection.
sentences.chinese: 腹腔注射后第12天电镜观察各组腹水瘤细胞涂片。

sentences.english: Ascites can be determined most easily by the demonstration of flank dullness.
sentences.chinese: 可通过出现侧腹部浊音最简便地发现腹水。

sentences.english: Objective: It summarized both clinical observation results and nursing care experience of postoperative patients with chylous ascites.
sentences.chinese: 总结手术后并发乳糜腹水的临床观察结果和护理经验。

sentences.english: Objective To observe clinical effects of ascites due to cirrhosis treated with Xiao Zhang Li Shui mixture.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察消胀利水合剂治疗肝硬化腹水的临床效果。

sentences.english: Patients present ascites and obvious spleen enlargement.
sentences.chinese: 患者呈现腹水及明显的脾肿大。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the curative effect of intraperitoneal perfusion on patients with tension ascites caused by advanced stage of liver cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肝癌伴张力性腹水时腹腔灌注治疗的疗效。

sentences.english: To explore the effect of intraperitoneal therapy to treat patients with tension ascites caused by advanced stage of liver cancer.
sentences.chinese: 探讨肝癌伴张力性腹水时腹腔灌注治疗的疗效。

sentences.english: The common reasons leading to omission diagnosis were also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 此外，尚对癌性腹水漏诊原因进行了分析。

sentences.english: Chylous ascites is still more uncommon; it is usually related to traumatic lymphatic injury.
sentences.chinese: 乳糜性腹水则更加少见，其通常和淋巴损伤相关。

sentences.english: What should diet of liver ascites patient notice?
sentences.chinese: 肝腹水患者日常饮食应该注意些什么？

sentences.english: Objective To research the differentiation diagnostic method of the begin or malignant ascites.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨良恶性腹水的鉴别诊断方法。

sentences.english: The tumor inhibit rate and the volume of ascites was calculated.
sentences.chinese: 计算抑瘤率及裸鼠腹水形成量。

definition: Cachexia (physical wasting associated with long-term illness)
